params.asset: RWA for which base asset is borrowed
params.base: base asset borrowed by RWA issuer

params.asset: RWA for which collateral is posted
params.collateral: collateral used to buy bond issued by RWA issuer

params.amount: amount of base asset paid back*

params.asset: RWA for which bond is issued
params.faceValue: par value of bond after discounting it with interest rate*

borrowBase(address,address,uint256).notice: Called by RWA issuer to to borrow base asset from Compound

postCollateral(address,address,uint256).notice: Used by RWA issuer to post collateral used to buy bonds issued by it to borrow from Compound

repayBase(address,address,uint256).notice: Called by RWA issuer to repay base asset to Compound and withdraw collateral posted earlier

submitNewRWA(address,address,uint256,str.notice: RWA issuer submits asset details and bond issued that can be purchased to provide collateral to the RWA issuer

userdoc.notice: A Compound III operator to enable staking of collateral for real world assets to Compound.
